long_description: The women's Lowdown Slim Sunglasses from Smith are a trimmer version of their larger sibling, the Lowdown. Proportioned for smaller faces, the Slims still give you hot styling for casual use. Lenses vary by frame color, but all offer 100% UV ray protection and are highly impact resistant. Impossibly Black frames have blackout lenses that block 90% of visible light; great for the beach or snow on bright days with a lot of glare. Celeste Blue and Crystal Poppy frames have gray gradient lenses that block 86% of visible light. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. Smith Lowdown Slim Sunglasses have hydrophilic nosepiece and temple pads that become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather.
short_description: The women's Lowdown Slim Sunglasses from Smith are a trimmer version of their larger sibling, the Lowdown. Proportioned for smaller faces, the Slims still give you hot styling for casual use.
